text: Ani jya lokanni imana rakhaleta ani satkarme kelita ani tyavarahi visvasa rakhala jo muham'mada (sallallahu alaihi vasallama) vara avatarita kela gela ahe ani vastutah tyancya palanakartyatarphe satya (dharma) dekhila toca ahe. Allahane tyace aparadha mitavile ani tyancya avastheta sudharana keli
